Action.author: sergey.minaev
Action.body: https://github.com/nagisa/rust_libloading/issues/41 describes similar scenario. Type of dltest library (used in sample from the issue) is dylib and after changing to cdylib the issue is not reproduced. But if we complicate dltest a bit (e.g. add println) - same problem appears again.

Action.author: gudkov
Action.body: Tests pass for now and CI build is re-stored.
